entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is the person who is being spoken to by Moody. He is described as a boy.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is the person who is speaking to Mundungus. He has a magical eye that can glare at people.

relationships.description: Moody speaks to Mundungus, telling him to give up some of his hairs.
